question: Approximately what time would you get up if you were entirely free to plan your day?
Approximately what time would you go to bed if you were entirely free to plan your evening?
How much do you depend on an alarm clock?
How easy do you find it to get up in the morning (when you are not awakened unexpectedly)?
How alert do you feel during the first half hour after you wake up in the morning?
description: 1 = Not at all alert,  4 = Very alert

question: How hungry do you feel during the first half hour after you wake up?
description: 1 = Not at all hungry, 4 = Very hungry

question: During the first half hour after you wake up in the morning, How do you feel?
What time would you go to bed if you had no commitments the next day?
A friend suggests that you exercise between 7-8 AM. How do you think you would perform?
description: 1 = Would find it very difficult, 4 = Would be in good form

question: At approximately what time in the evening do you feel tired?
You want to be at your peak performance for a test. Which testing time would you choose?
If you got into bed at 11 PM, how tired would you be?
description: 1 = Not at all tired,  4 = Very tired

question: You have gone to bed several hours later than usual. How likely are you to wake up at the usual time?
description: 1 = Wake up later than usual, 4 = Wake up at usual time

question: You remain awake between 4-6 AM in order to carry out a night watch. When would you go to bed?
description: 1 = Would sleep after watch, 4 = Would sleep before the watch

question: You have two hours of hard physical work. Which time would you choose to start?
description: Ideal time to do physical work

question: A friend suggests that you exercise between 10-11 PM. How well do you think you would perform?
description: 1 = Would be in good form, 4 = Would find it very difficult

question: You work a five-hour day and are paid based on your performance. At what time would you begin?
At approximately what time of day do you usually feel your best?
Do you consider yourself a morning type or an evening type?
